record.title: ORDERS FOR THURSDAY, JANUARY 25, 2007

speaking.paragraph: I ask unanimous consent that when the Senate completes its business today, it stand adjourned until 9:30 a.m., Thursday, January 25; that on Thursday, following the prayer and pledge, the Journal of proceedings be approved to date, the morning hour be deemed expired, the time for the two leaders be reserved for their use later in the day, and the Senate then resume consideration of H.R. 2, as provided under the previous order.

record.chair: Without objection, it is so ordered.
